Package cams.database

Class UnifiedUserRepository

java.lang.Object
cams.database.UnifiedUserRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserRepository
public class UnifiedUserRepository extends Object implements UserRepository
Implements UserRepository as a Singleton to manage and store User objects. Provides functionalities to add, retrieve, and query users.

    • retrieveUser

      public User retrieveUser(String userID)
      Retrieves a user by their userID.

      UserIDs are treated as case-insensitive for retrieval purposes.

      Specified by:
      retrieveUser in interface UserRepository
      Parameters:
      userID - The userID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The User object if found, null otherwise.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the repository is empty.
      Specified by:
      isEmpty in interface UserRepository
      Returns:
      true if the repository contains no users, false otherwise.

    • initialiseData

      public boolean initialiseData()
      Initializes the repository data from stored files.

      Loads User objects from serialized files located in a specified directory.

      Returns:
      true if data initialization is successful, false otherwise.

    • initialiseData

      public boolean initialiseData(String filename, UserType userType)
      Initializes user objects from Excel files and automatically serializes the objects.

      Reads user data from an Excel file and adds the users to the repository based on the specified user type.

      Parameters:
      filename - The filename of the Excel file containing user data.
      userType - The type of users to be added (STUDENT or STAFF).
      Returns:
      true if data initialization is successful, false otherwise.
